name: part_009
file: tmp_【 #アキロゼ5周年Live 】ーHistoric ROUTE ５ー￤3DLIVE【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [hURqBaVxnSg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal performs the song "キミにまつわる運命事情" (Kimi ni Matsuwaru Unmei Jijo) accompanied by back dancers dressed as a drum corps.
scenes.song_name: キミにまつわる運命事情
speakers: アキ・ローゼンタール

scenes.description: MC section where Aki Rosenthal thanks the drum corps, interacts with the audience, and changes her headwear before introducing the next song.
speakers: アキ・ローゼンタール

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal performs "ROSE of the LAMP" with special guests Takanashi Kiara, Tokoyami Towa, Kureiji Ollie, and Pavolia Reine.
speakers: アキ・ローゼンタール

subtitles.original: どうしようもないヨ Everyday
subtitles.english: It's hopeless, Everyday

subtitles.original: 現実（リアル）は手強い
subtitles.english: Reality is tough

subtitles.original: だけど試練の向こうへ
subtitles.english: But I'll go beyond the trials

subtitles.original: ため息ついてここから
subtitles.english: Starting from here with a sigh

subtitles.original: 立ち上がれたらまた
subtitles.english: If I can stand up again,

subtitles.original: なにかが始まる
subtitles.english: Something will begin

subtitles.original: going now! going now! がむしゃら君に
subtitles.english: going now! going now! Recklessly to you

subtitles.original: どこへだって繰り出して
subtitles.english: Setting out to anywhere

subtitles.original: 胸張って楽しんじゃおう Up and down
subtitles.english: Stand tall and let's have fun, Up and down

subtitles.original: Say Everyone
subtitles.english: Say Everyone

subtitles.original: going now! going now! 蹴散らしちゃえよ
subtitles.english: going now! going now! Kick it all away

subtitles.original: そういう　あいう　波乱万丈
subtitles.english: That kind of ups and downs

subtitles.original: 大体の運命
subtitles.english: Most of destiny,

subtitles.original: 変えてくのは自分だって
subtitles.english: it's you who changes it

subtitles.original: キミは知ってる
subtitles.english: You know that

subtitles.original: 電車で割り込み
subtitles.english: Cutting in line on the train,

subtitles.original: コンビニで傘無くなった
subtitles.english: lost my umbrella at the convenience store

subtitles.original: ジリジリ減っているハートの残機
subtitles.english: The remaining lives of my heart are slowly decreasing

subtitles.original: あとどれくらい？
subtitles.english: How much more?

subtitles.original: 辻褄合ってなくていい
subtitles.english: It doesn't have to make sense

subtitles.original: 悲劇の１秒先で
subtitles.english: Just one second past the tragedy

subtitles.original: 思い切り笑ったら
subtitles.english: If you laugh with all your heart,

subtitles.original: いい日に格上げ
subtitles.english: it's upgraded to a good day

subtitles.original: Let's get it going now! going now! 顔上げてほら
subtitles.english: Let's get it going now! going now! Look up, see?

subtitles.original: ありのままのステップで
subtitles.english: With your natural steps

subtitles.original: 予測不能な未来を　踏み出して
subtitles.english: Step out into an unpredictable future

subtitles.original: Say Everyone
subtitles.english: Say Everyone

subtitles.original: going now! going now! 吹き飛ばしちゃえ
subtitles.english: going now! going now! Blow it all away

subtitles.original: 冴えない　浮かない顔した
subtitles.english: With that dull, gloomy face

subtitles.original: 今日なんて全部
subtitles.english: Everything about today,

subtitles.original: 自分だけがそう出来るって
subtitles.english: only you can make it happen

subtitles.original: キミは知ってる
subtitles.english: You know that

subtitles.original: I will try it again!
subtitles.english: I will try it again!

subtitles.original: 分かってるはずさ
subtitles.english: You should know that

subtitles.original: I will try it again!
subtitles.english: I will try it again!

subtitles.original: ひらかれるはずさ
subtitles.english: It should be opened

subtitles.original: 今はまだ遠い　そんな景色
subtitles.english: That scenery is still far away

subtitles.original: 怖くても　眩しくても
subtitles.english: Even if it's scary or dazzling

subtitles.original: この手で掴めるまで…
subtitles.english: Until I can grasp it with these hands...

subtitles.original: Let's get it going now! going now! がむしゃら君に
subtitles.english: Let's get it going now! going now! Recklessly to you

subtitles.original: どこへだって繰り出して
subtitles.english: Setting out to anywhere

subtitles.original: 胸張って楽しんじゃおう Up and down
subtitles.english: Stand tall and let's have fun, Up and down

subtitles.original: Say Everyone
subtitles.english: Say Everyone

subtitles.original: 逃げない！しげない！あきらめないで！
subtitles.english: Don't run! Don't lose! Don't give up!

subtitles.original: そういう　あいう　波乱万丈
subtitles.english: That kind of ups and downs

subtitles.original: 大体の運命
subtitles.english: Most of destiny,

subtitles.original: 変えてくのは自分
subtitles.english: it's you who changes it

subtitles.original: さあ　どうするんだ
subtitles.english: Now, what will you do?

subtitles.original: ハッピーチューンの奏で方
subtitles.english: The way to play a happy tune

subtitles.original: キミは知ってる
subtitles.english: You know that

subtitles.original: はーい！『キミにまつわる運命事情』でしたー！
subtitles.english: Hi! That was 'Kimi ni Matsuwaru Unmei Jijo'!

subtitles.original: そして、スネアドラムのスペシャルパフォーマンスでした。ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: And that was the snare drum special performance. Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: そして、太鼓隊、集まれー！パン！
subtitles.english: And now, drum corps, assemble! Bam!

subtitles.original: お、お、あ、あれ？
subtitles.english: Oh, oh, ah, huh?

subtitles.original: 一人減ったな。一人減ったな（笑）
subtitles.english: One person left. One person left (laughs).

subtitles.original: はい、ということでめちゃめちゃかっこいいパフォーマンス、ありがとう！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Alright, thank you for that amazing performance! Yay!

subtitles.original: じゃあね！バイバイ！
subtitles.english: See ya! Bye bye!

subtitles.original: ふぅ。めちゃめちゃかっこよかったでしょう？
subtitles.english: Phew. That was really cool, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: よし！５周年ライブ、まだまだ続くからね！
subtitles.english: Alright! The 5th anniversary live continues!

subtitles.original: アキロゼ、ちょっとお帽子外してくるから、ちょっと待っててね！
subtitles.english: AkiRose is going to take off this hat for a bit, so please wait a moment!

subtitles.original: よし！
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: まだまだ盛り上がっていく準備、できてるかー！？
subtitles.english: Are you ready to keep getting hyped!?

subtitles.original: アキロゼ５周年ライブ、ここから、まだまだ盛り上げていくよ！
subtitles.english: AkiRose 5th anniversary live, we're going to keep the hype going from here!

subtitles.original: それでは、次の曲はこれだ！
subtitles.english: Now, here's the next song!

subtitles.original: Make a step Make a step Yeah 小宵はバラ色のナイト
subtitles.english: Make a step Make a step Yeah Tonight is a rose-colored night

subtitles.original: 奇妙をのせて　踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Carry the strange along and let's dance

subtitles.original: アローナ！
subtitles.english: Alona!

subtitles.original: なんだって フレーバー シレイバー 隠した思い
subtitles.english: Whatever flavor, whatever flavor, hidden thoughts

subtitles.original: 月が綺麗ね ロマンティック
subtitles.english: The moon is beautiful, isn't it? Romantic

subtitles.original: 罪には 甘く フレーバー 果実のように
subtitles.english: Sin is sweet, flavor like a fruit

subtitles.original: 君にそっと ささやくの
subtitles.english: I'll whisper softly to you

subtitles.original: 情熱のソース
subtitles.english: Passion source
